## Map


```r
library(leaflet)

df <- data.frame(lat=runif(500, min=29.54, max=29.74),
                 lng=runif(500, min=-82.45, max=-82.25))
df %>%
    leaflet() %>%
    addTiles() %>%
    addMarkers(clusterOptions=markerClusterOptions())
```
